resetTitle: Do you want to reset the game?
resetDescription: All players and previous topics will be reset when you reset the game.
aboutDescription:
This interactive web game is created to encourage lively and friendly discussions among players. The administrator player has the ability to add participants and initiate the game. Topics will be presented in a sequential manner, and each player will be given a specific time limit to share their thoughts and opinions.

RawRaw is the perfect solution for individuals who struggle with finding topics of conversation. It provides an entertaining way to spend time with friends and socialize. The player information, previous titles, and other details are securely stored in your browser for your convenience.

RawRaw offers three distinct theme options within the application, allowing you to tailor the experience to your environment. Whether you're at home, at a party, or in a different setting, you can easily switch between themes to ensure a personalized and enjoyable experience. üòè
